column3: â€œHands down my favorite weed of all time. This is what I thought smoking weed would he like before I actually started. It's the ideal strain! I'm so creative, more intellectual, and not zoned out! Perfect....â€

â€œNice strain for depression and stress.  Mood/mind altering for sure.  Will give you even more patients to deal with stressors.

â€œThis is a very powerful smoke. The taste is terrible, but on the plus side it doesn't take much. I can only relate my first experience of this strain to that of mushrooms. â€œI picked up and O of what the person claimed was this, for 4/20. Very excited to be able to smoke it all day without wanting to pass out. Smoked about a gram of it already and it's very potent, the scent is strong lemon and diesel, taste is earthy, spicy, a true haze. As my girl friend and I both put it, this bud takes you to a different place than most any other buds do.â€

â€œThis is my favourite strain of weed. It is a great tasting smoke and I would recommend it to anyone. The buzz you get is long lasting and very interesting, it's unlike other buds I've smoked. Nice in a joint and as a blunt.â€

â€œI've recently come to find out that this strain is a Sativa dominate hybrid, as opposed by my previous journal entry [In which I stated this was an Indica, derp]. â€œWasn't happy with her growth characteristics, but she does clone extremely well. I also read that she is hard to flower. That was not my experience. I grew 2 of these, one in soil, one in hydro.
